dcterms:creator: Amir Shahroudy
Jun Liu
Tian-Tsong Ng
Gang Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 56,578 videos with 25 joints in each frame, organized into 60 action categories. It is used for evaluating action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60 Dataset (NTU 60)

dcterms:creator: Jun Liu
Amir Shahroudy
Mauricio Perez
Gang Wang
Ling-Yu Duan
Alex C. Kot
dcterms:description: An extension of the NTU 60 dataset, containing 114,480 videos with 120 action categories. It is used for evaluating action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120 Dataset (NTU 120)

dcterms:creator: Jiaying Liu
Sijie Song
Chunhui Liu
Yanghao Li
Yueyu Hu
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for multi-modality 3D understanding of human actions, containing 51 action categories and almost 20,000 instances. It supports action detection tasks.
dcterms:title: PKU Multi-Modality Dataset (PKUMMD)
